#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    vector<unsigned long long> dp(22);
    dp[1]=0;
    dp[2]=1;
    for(unsigned long long i=3; i<22; i++)
    {
        dp[i] =  (i-1)*dp[i-1] + (i-2)*dp[i-2];
    }
    while(t--)
    {
        unsigned long long k,n;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&k,&n);
        unsigned long long mod;
        if(k<=9)
            mod=10;
        else if(k<100)
            mod=100;
        else
            mod=1000;
        if(k==0 && n==1)
        {
            printf("1\n");
        }
        else
        {
            unsigned long long x = dp[n],dig,cnt=0;
            while(x>0)
            {
                dig=x%mod;
                if(k==dig)
                    cnt++;
                x/=10;
            }
            printf("%lld\n",cnt);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
